http://www.townofwalls.com |footnotes = }}  'Walls', is a
town located in northern DeSoto County, Mississippi near the Mississippi River,
part of the larger region known as "The Delta", and known for its rich, dark
soil. It uses the ZIP code 38680. https://tools.usps.com/go/ZipLookupResul-
tsAction!input.action?resultMode=0&companyName=&address1=&address2=&city=walls&-
state=MS&urbanCode=&postalCode=&zip=
